column2:
tomate |>
  group_by(product, time) |> 
  summarise(sev_mean = mean(sev),
            sev_sd = sd(sev)) |>
  ggplot(aes(product, sev_mean, color = product)) +
  geom_point(size = 1.5) +
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = sev_mean - sev_sd,
                    ymax = sev_mean + sev_sd),
                width = 0.1) +
  theme_classic() +
  labs( x = "Tempo",
        y = "Severidade (%)",
        color = "Produto")+
  facet_wrap(~time, ncol = 2)+
 theme(legend.position = "top")
[38;5;232m`summarise()` has grouped output by 'product'. You can override using the `.groups` argument.[39m
